69049.Title: The Other Side of the Wind
69049.title: The Other Side of the Wind
69049.cast: John Huston, Oja Kodar, Peter Bogdanovich, Susan Strasberg, Robert Random, Lilli Palmer, Norman Foster, Edmond O'Brien, Mercedes McCambridge, Cameron Mitchell, Paul Stewart
69049.description: On the last day of his life, a legendary director struggles to complete a new project and contemplates his legacy in this layered film by Orson Welles.
